entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly Msal TryAddAdditionalParameter does nothing #48136
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #48135
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48134
  • Adding Blazor WebAssembly project reference breaks Hot Reloading for Razor pages #48132
  • Uncaught (in promise) Error: Found malformed component comment at Blazor: #48123
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc, plaintext #48119
  • Handle `AsParameters`-enabled types with indexers in request delegate creation #48118

Closed

  • Dev cert issue #47834
  • AmbiguousMatchException when deployed on azure infrastructure #48130
  • Remove Razor SDK dependency in StaticWebAssets SDK #47374
    8.0-preview5
  • Binding to a list with more than 255 items fails #48129
  • Introduce ListenOptions.GetServerCertificate #48055
  • Make https://github.com/aspnet/quickgridsamples public #48122
    Backlog
  • How to Base64UrlEncode in Blazor WebAssembly client now that Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities has been deprecated? #48068
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly: registering circuit breaker with parameters disables the breaker #48089
  • IWebHostEnvironment does not return the appropriate physical path when debugging #47909

PullRequests

Created

  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime
  • Make KestrelConfigurationLoader.Load safe to re-call #48137
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2175980 #48131
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [Blazor] Invoke `receiveHotReloadAsync` directly #47964
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Update SDK #48127
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • http.sys (6.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48072
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 6.0.18
  • Fix AOT test skip condition #48126
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • http.sys (7.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48073
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.7
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2175417 #48106
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix StackOverflowException in RoutePatternAnalyzer #48105
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Change access modifier of ForceSignOut() #48102
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime, feature-rdg
  • Use Node 18 (LTS) #48087
    area-infrastructure
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
